programme.title: Drive by History: Eats
programme.desc: As America's poet, Whitman is certainly known for his literary canon, but he also had a lot to say about food. Discover how to prepare a delicious Whitman-style meal from the 1850's, including the cake he made himself and frequently gave away as gifts.
